DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy and adverse effect from long-pulsed dye laser versus long-pulsed dye laser-mediated photodynamic therapy for acne vulgaris and rosacea.
DOC.brief_title: Laser-Mediated Photodynamic Therapy of Acne Vulgaris and Rosacea
DOC.criteria: Inflammatory acne and rosacea Skin types IIV Patients younger than 18 years Skin types V and VI Topical and systemic conventional acne treatments
